articles.title: World stocks, Wall St futures sink on Ukraine invasion fears - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Wall Street's benchmark S&P 500 index lost 1.9% on Friday after the White House told Americans to leave Ukraine within 48 hours. Other governments including Russia pulled diplomats and their citizens out of the country.
